# Installation

```sh
$ npm i hexo-solitude-tag
```

# Usage

## Youtube

```ejs
{% youtube video_id [type] [cookie] %}
```

> Documentation: [伍十七的博客](https://blog.everfu.cn/p/8f9926b7.html)
